InstalledItem.Name: BlastChill
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Civilian

The BlastChill is a consumer-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd. It keeps your ship running without straining its signature, but is best known for a much mocked 2945 ad campaign that promised it was “Built to bring the chill.”

InstalledItem.Name: LightBlossom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Featuring stylish design and strong performance, the LightBlossom is a worthy addition to Sakura Sun’s line-up, continuing the reputation the conglomerate has for making everything and making it well.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: HEX
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

Prepare your ship for any circumstance by installing a HEX from Seal Corporation. Balanced performance and durability make this an ideal, versatile choice for those who don’t know where their next adventure may take them.

InstalledItem.Name: HEX
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

Prepare your ship for any circumstance by installing a HEX from Seal Corporation. Balanced performance and durability make this an ideal, versatile choice for those who don’t know where their next adventure may take them.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: FoxFire
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Ace Astrogation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Competition

The FoxFire won't leave a burning trail in your wake, but this quantum drive’s strong performance leaves an equal impression. Making it another elegant and powerful component from the folks at Ace Astrogation.

InstalledItem.Name: Explorer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.
